title: kindreds pasive a big bs
body: So iv played kindred over the last week and any game the goes past 40 min is just dum as kindred will have 40%+ in hp damage. And im not being salty no its bs wen you can go ad crit and 1 shot some one with only a 1k crits. Like plz riot make a line above 20% hp so you cant just go on and on to get that 40%+ damage in hp.

replies.body: Quit letting the game last 40 minutes, that's like being against a veigar or Nasus letting them farm and then complaining when they one hit you at 40 minutes.
While I do agree with quick games being the counterplay against someone like Kindred, I DO think it should have a cap on it.
I was the guy who was 1 hitting so im not complaining im just saying it needs a nerf or a lv cap if you will like how you can only go to lv 18 make it the same with kindred's passive.
